main event: A sighting of four bright, white lights in Snohomish, Washington on September 1, 1962.
interesting points: The lights were described as hovering near the horizon and were very steady without any sound., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., The object was documented in connection with Project Blue Book., An analysis report concluded the sample related to this sighting had a chemical composition consistent with bentonite clay., There were mentions of photographs possibly related to the UFO in Snohomish.
